alert.note: Alert for Gove; Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan, southwestern Graham and northeastern Gove Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 647 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Quinter, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Quinter around 655 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 99 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
